mapper.select: SELECT PREG_GOODS_NO /* prPregGoodsPayMeanInfo.getPregGoodsPayMeanInfoList */ , PAY_WAY_CD , USE_YN , SYS_REG_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_REG_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_REG_DTM , SYS_MOD_ID , TO_CHAR(SYS_MOD_DTM,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SYS_MOD_DTM FROM PR_PREG_GOODS_PAY_MEAN_INFO WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PREG_GOODS_NO = #{pregGoodsNo} ORDER BY PAY_WAY_CD
